name: Infinite Vengeance
description:
Infinite Vengeance

When invaders decide to to take control there is only one way to respond, fight back and save your home. Take on the role of Donnie Dust as you face a rogue group of vigilantes hell-bent on taking over your hometown. You fight alone, with only the pistol your grandpa gave you and your baseball bat from little league. Will you do what ever you can to protect your city?
